heading: UNefi ubhala ngezinto zikaNkulunkulu—Injongo kaNefi wukuvumisa abantu ukuthi beze kuNkulunkulu ka-Abrahama futhi basindiswe. Cishe ngonyaka wama 600 kuya kowama 592 ngaphambi kokuzalwa kukaKristu.

verses.txt: Manje mina, Nefi, anginiki umlando wobaba bami kulenxenye yombhalo wami; futhi angizukuwunikeza nanoma yingasiphi esinye isikhathi kulezi zingcwephe engibhala kuzo; ngokuba unikeziwe embhalweni ogcinwe ngubaba; ngakho-ke, angizukuwubhala kulomsebenzi.
Ngokuba kuyanganelisa ukusho ukuthi thina singabenzalo kaJosefa.

Futhi akubalulekile ukuthi ngicophelele ukunikeza indaba egcwele ngazo zonke izinto zikababa, ngokuba azinakulotshwa kulezi zingcwephe, ngokuba ngifuna isikhala ukuze ngibhale ngezinto zikaNkulunkulu.
Ngokuba inhloso yami ephelele kungukuthi ngivumise abantu ukuthi beze kuNkulunkulu ka-Abrahama, noNkulunkulu ka-Isaka, kanye noNkulunkulu kaJakobe, futhi basindiswe.
Ngalokho-ke, izinto ezithokozisa umhlaba angizibhali, kodwa izinto lezo ezithokozisayo kuNkulunkulu kanye nakulabo okungesibo abezwe.
Ngalokho-ke, ngiyonikeza umyalelo enzalweni yami, wokuthi ayiyikugcwalisa lezi zingcwephe ngezinto ezingabalulekile kubantwana babantu.
